text: ction. High-dose radiation therapy to the lymph nodes of the neck may be given before or after surgery.    - Partial laryngopharyngectomy. High-dose radiation therapy to the lymph nodes of the neck may be given before or after surgery.    -  Chemotherapy given during or after radiation therapy or after surgery.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy followed by radiation therapy or surgery.        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer clinical trials that are now accepting patients with stage II
